definition: to succeed in life/to become somebody
Jackie Chan (1954-), kungfu film and Cantopop star
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
lit. to hope one's son becomes a dragon (idiom); fig. to long for one' s child to succeed in life/to have great hopes for one's offspring/to give one's child the best education as a career investment

sentences.english: Is Chenglong one of the most popular actors?

sentences.english: At first, Chan seems to be a pathetic patsy to Tuckers aggression.

sentences.english: Jacky Chen is the king of the hill in Hongkong's film industry.
sentences.chinese: 成龙是香港电影圈里最顶尖的人物。

sentences.english: How do we know that Hollywood likes Jackie Chan?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎样知道好莱坞喜欢成龙？

sentences.english: It also features an early apperance of Jackie Chan.

sentences.english: In the homespun wisdom of Jackie Chan, the way forward is simple.
sentences.chinese: 以成龙的朴素智慧，其前进方向也很简单明了。

sentences.english: Jackie was becoming a huge success in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 成龙在亚洲获得了极大的成功。

sentences.english: Yoo sung-ryong found in the core Ming army plundered the cattle of the people of north Korea.

sentences.english: Ningbo Chenglong Special Steel Co. , Ltd has Long years of marketing and distribution of special steel.
sentences.chinese: 成龙特殊钢有限公司长年经营特殊钢的营销和配送。

sentences.english: This is that parents long to see the son succeed in life, look at the woman Cheng Feng's only method?
sentences.chinese: 这难道就是家长们望子成龙，望女成凤的唯一做法吗？

sentences.english: Oh, listen, Jacky Chan is singing a song to celebrate our 60th National Day.
sentences.chinese: 哦，听，成龙在唱一首歌为我们建国60年献礼。

sentences.english: But Chan guides me inside to his real treasures.
sentences.chinese: 不过，成龙引我到里面看他真正的宝藏。

sentences.english: The Golden Dragon and He Shirong decided to catch Liu Junfu, then attack Yu Chenglong.
sentences.chinese: 黄金龙和何士荣决定先抓了刘君孚，再攻击于成龙。
